abstract: Lamine Diack, former president of International Association of Athletics Federations, resigns as president of Monaco-based athletics charity International Athletics Foundation; is under investigation for allegedly taking bribes to cover up Russian track and field athletes testing positive for doping.
lead_paragraph: Lamine Diack, who is under investigation in France on suspicion of corruption and money laundering,resigned as president of the International Athletics Foundation.
snippet: Lamine Diack, who is under investigation in France on suspicion of corruption and money laundering,resigned as president of the International Athletics Foundation.
